description.value: You can call upon the vital essence of your spirit to restore life to your allies and call forth vines to ensnare and bludgeon your foes. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Field of Life]{Field of Life} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Tangling Creepers]{Tangling Creepers} as 6th-level primal innate spells once per day each. You become an expert in primal spell attack rolls and primal spell DCs.
